Athelet's Schedule

7am - 8am
Reporting to work; receiving information from the previous day’s crew; checking the truck for all essential equipment; raising the flag.
8am - 9am
Doing fitness exercises, such as weight training, cardio, and crossfit.
9am - 11am
Participating in various tasks or events, such as self-study, training, or public education events.
11am - 12Pm
Responding to a medical call: a patient suffering from a heart attack. Our crew performs CPR until the medical crew arrives on scene. At that point, we assist the ambulance crew until the patient is taken to the hospital.
